name: Rogue Void
description:
A 2 button high score chaser. Delve into the void and try and beat your last high score.  You can control your ship with only 2 buttons, "Left" and "Right",  or alternatively, with "A" and "D".

  • "Left" or "A" rotates your ship counter-clockwise.
  • "Right" or "D" rotates your ship clockwise.
  • Pressing both buttons together triggers a boost! Ooh, fancy!
